summary: Allows you to finally loot paralyzed people.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Loot Paralyzed People[/size][/center]
[center][size=1]Or Sky-Immersive Paralysis Realistic Overhaul[/size][/center]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=320674732]Also available on Steam Workshop[/url]
[size=4]This mod allows you to Loot paralyzed people, doesn't matter the source of this paralysis: poison, spell, power, whatever. If it's paralyzed, you can loot it, period.[/size]

[list][*][size=3]Compatible with anything A.F.A.I.K.[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=3]No special requirements. The ESP file has no master, which means it will be compatible with future total conversion mods.[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3]Only two scripts, and they will not run everytime.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Please install with NMM or Mod Organizer, or any software that suits your tastes.[/size]
[size=4]Enjoy![/size]
author: Sagittarius22
